channel.title: Just created my private server, NOW WHAT?!?
channel.description:
Hey i just got a server up and iv made myself owner..
now how do i make all my skills 99?? and like unlimited health and run etc...
also what is the first thing i should do with my server.. how do i get stuff into shops and npc in places i want them?? (without having to code, like stuff that is already made up)

item.title: Just created my private server, NOW WHAT?!?
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

Ok well in most rsps the owner has the command ::master try that it should give you all 99s if it doesnt then just go into your source file, look for the character files you should find your name somewhere in there open it up then scroll down and you should see your stats. Now replace all the skills that say 1 with 99 and all the XP that is to the right of the skill to 14000000. Now for unlimeted health your going to be looking at the skills the ones your just edited. your going to have to do trial and error on this part. you canot make ur health unlimited but pretty damn close. just pick one of your now 99 skills to 9999 and then log in see wich skill is now 9999 if it isnt hp then try again.

What i did at first with my server is just messed around with it. get to know your own server then change the stuff

Read full topic
item.source: Just created my private server, NOW WHAT?!?
